summary: The document is a declassified record pertaining to the President John F. Kennedy Assassination Records Act of 1992. It details an interaction with Jane Roman, the preparation of a memo for the FBI, and includes a note about returning to sender, along with references to Robert Montgomery.
key_findings: The document references the President John F. Kennedy Assassination Records Act of 1992.
It mentions an interaction with Jane Roman and the preparation of a memo for the FBI.
The document includes a note about returning to sender and references Robert Montgomery.
